coffees.title: Dalgona Macha
coffees.description: A matcha powder whipped with instant coffee powder, sugar, and hot water until it becomes frothy and then adding it to cold or hot milk.

coffees.title: Bursting Blueberry
coffees.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vivamus suscipit iaculis ex, sollicitudin molestie quam pharetra non. Sed quis purus a mi porttitor posuere tempor ac orci. Nam pharetra tempor nisi, non sodales leo vehicula et.

coffees.title: Cinnamon & Cocoa
coffees.description: Cocoa and cinnamon latte is perfect to warm you in a cold winter afternoon. And looks like a drink from a fancy coffee shop. You can make it at home, without putting that much work into it. The combination of coconut milk, cocoa, and cinnamon? Delicious!

coffees.title: Classic Latte
coffees.description: A coffee-based drink made primarily from espresso and steamed milk. It consists of one-third espresso, two-thirds heated milk and about 1cm of foam.

coffees.title: Hot Americano
coffees.description: A single or double-shot of espresso combined with up to four or five ounces of hot water in a two-demitasse cup.  Can served cold with ice.

coffees.title: Drizzled with Caramel
coffees.description: A single espresso shot poured into hot foamy milk, with the surface topped with mildly sweetened cocoa powder and drizzled with scrumptious caramel syrup

coffees.title: Classic Flat White
coffees.description: prepared by pouring microfoam (steamed milk from the bottom of a pitcher) over a single (30ml) or double shot (60ml) of espresso. Microfoam is used, resulting in a smooth and velvety texture.

coffees.title: White Chocolate Mocha
coffees.description: Blended coffee base, whole milk (type of milk can be changed based on selection), white chocolate syrup drizzled inside, and blended ice with Whipped cream.

coffees.title: Cold Mocha
coffees.description: Rich and chocolatey mocha drink, icy cold to chill you on a hot day. This is a delicious way to get your caffeine fix!

coffees.title: Absolute Black
coffees.description: No frills here: Black coffee is made from plain ground coffee beans that are brewed hot. It's served without added sugar, milk, or flavorings.
